card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.property: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Convalescence
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 10 or less life, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Limited Resources
card.property: When Limited Resources enters the battlefield, each player chooses five lands they control and sacrifices the rest. Players can't play lands as long as ten or more lands are on the battlefield.

card.name: Oath of Lieges
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses target player who controls more lands than they do and is their opponent. The first player may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.
